title: HOUR 1 - Watson, Mayfield, Adams, Stafford
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Watson, Mayfield, Adams, Stafford
description:
The Browns continue to be loud at the QB position

Davante Adams didn't thank Aaron Rodgers

Matt Stafford made the smart play by taking less money


Guest: Rick Spielman

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
